categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The subjugation of the Yatir on the planet Absit was a battle that took place during the Galactic Civil War, on the Yatir homeworld. The planet was overrun by the Imperial Army's Imperial Hammers Elite Armor Unit, also known as the Hell's Hammers; the conflict resulted in the subjugation of the Yatir.
